name: Modern Sculptures Showcase
location: Museum of Contemporary Art, Los Angeles, CA
short_description: Discover the bold and innovative sculptures redefining art today.
long_description: The Museum of Contemporary Art invites you to explore the creativity and ingenuity of modern sculpture. Featuring works by groundbreaking artists, this exhibit challenges conventional norms and inspires new perspectives.
return_policy_specifics: Refundable up to 48 hours before the event.
